body_html: probably nicer to have a separate PeepholeLstmCell function+mode rather than adding a peephole option to the RNN interface since not all RNNs have the concept of a peephole and it clutters the API
body_text: probably nicer to have a separate PeepholeLstmCell function+mode rather than adding a peephole option to the RNN interface since not all RNNs have the concept of a peephole and it clutters the API
body: probably nicer to have a separate PeepholeLstmCell function+mode rather than adding a peephole option to the RNN interface since not all RNNs have the concept of a peephole and it clutters the API
